ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: As tempted as I am, I cannot let my characters just explode. I need to keep repeating that to myself. BIC: Shokaract didn t expect the disks, and one hit

OOC: As tempted as I am, I cannot let my characters just explode. I need to=
 keep repeating that to myself.

BIC: Shokaract didn't expect the disks, an=
d one hit him almost harmlessly, but the other sliced into him. Green goo s=
prayed from a crevice in his side. However, he was silent about it. He aime=
d the gattling gun at Hell Drak and fired 3 laser bolts from it, then raise=
d his tiny hot dog gun and fired 4 shots from it, also aimed at Hell Drak..=
.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Testifier: Abyssian Badass 
  To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, September 13, 2001 7:28 AM
  Su=
bject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


  "No way, bitchwheat!" Hell Drak yell=
ed, rolling and firing two lazer discs at Shokaract.
    ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
    From: Roland the Last Gunslinger 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 11:52 PM
    Subject: Re: At=
tack!/Orion/Shokaract


    It hit Shokaract. EXPLODE! Somehow, the languag=
e woke Shokaract from his trance, not the missile. He transformed into robo=
t mode and beckoned Hell Drak to come closer with a movement of his hand...=


      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Testifier: Abyssian Badas=
s 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2=
001 11:19 PM
      Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


      Hell Drak a=
voided the missile.
       
      "Not this time, fucko!" Hell Drak yelled,=
 firing a lazer back at Shokaract.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
      From: Roland the Last Gunslinger 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

        Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 9:53 PM
        Subject: Re: A=
ttack!/Orion/Shokaract


        The lasers his Shokaract all 4 times, but =
he didn't seem to notice, he was fixated on some thing only he could see, s=
omething from his own mind. Ahh! PSYCHO! Shokaract fires a single missile b=
ack at Hell Drak...

          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From=
: Testifier: Abyssian Badass 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
       =
   Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 9:29 PM
          Subject: Re: Attac=
k!/Orion/Shokaract


          ::Headshot/Hell Drak/Triggerhappy::
        =
   
          Headshot ducked by a tree.  One of Orion's shots nailed him i=
n the side.
           
          "Ah, f***!!!!!!!" Headshot yelled, holdin=
g his side in pain, getting up from being knocked down.
           
       =
   Headshot climbed up into the tree, and fired a sniper shot at Orion.  He=
adshot was standing up, so, if he was hit......(hint hint!)
          ~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~
          Hell Drak was hit by the two missiles.  She went flyin=
g back into a wall.  Hell Drak fired 4 lazers at Shokaract.
          ~~~~~=
~~~
          Triggerhappy flew out of the way of Orion's shots.  Triggerha=
ppy flew down, attempting to ram right into Orion!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!=
